short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notifies you when new emails arrived in your Yahoo Mail box

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You must be logged into Yahoo for this add-on to work!

If there are problems after updating the add-on, try to reinstall the add-on first before creating a new issue.

The difference between this and the other add-ons are:
This add-on only fetches a small data (kb) instead of the full page (mb) what the other add-ons are doing.

Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com.

This extension is not created by Yahoo!
